DOC.detailed_description: After obtain approval local ethic committee South Egypt Cancer Institute , Assiut University , Assiut , Egypt , parent 's write informed consent , randomize double -blinded prospective study conduct ( 60 ) pediatric patient . After intravenous cannula place , fluid therapy standardize surgery . After secure tube place , patient place lateral decubitus position intrathecal anesthesia perform use 25 gauge needle ( Brown ® , Germany ) . Children randomly allocate 3 group use opaque seal envelope contain computer generate randomization schedule . The opaque seal envelope sequentially number opened application anesthetic plan group include ( 20 ) patient : Group ( 1 ) : child receive intrathecal bupivacaine ( 0.5 % ) 0.4mg/kg 2ml volume ; inject slowly . Group ( 2 ) : child receive intrathecal bupivacaine ( 0.5 % ) 0.4mg/kg plus fentanyl 0.2 μg/kg 2ml volume ; inject slowly . Group ( 3 ) : child receive intrathecal bupivacaine ( 0.5 % ) 0.4mg/kg plus dexmedetomidine 0.2 μg/kg 2ml volume ; inject slowly . Anesthesia maintain oxygen , sevoflurane , atracurium besylate ( 0.15mg/kg ) muscle relaxant control mechanical ventilation .
